articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens higher on mining stocks boost, encouraging economic data - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index opened higher on Thursday as mining stocks tracked higher bullion prices, while government data showed that domestic wholesale trade most likely rose by 1.1% in May sequentially.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens higher on surprise trade surplus - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock opened higher on Tuesday, a day after hitting record high, as data showing a surprise domestic trade surplus in April lifted sentiment.
articles.content:

articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX hits record high on energy, banking boost - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index touched a record high on Monday as heavyweight energy and banking stocks gained, while investors await U.S inflation data due later this week.
